abilityEffect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may choose a card from your hand and put it on top of your deck. Then, search your deck for up to 2 basic Energy cards, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward. This power can't be used if Bronzong is affected by a Special Condition.

effect.en: If you have the same number of cards in your hand as your opponent, this attack does 20 damage plus 40 more damage and the Defending Pok√©mon is now Confused.
